name: TestRequestBuilder
description: Unit tests for the RequestBuilder class, focusing on various HTTP methods and WebSocket requests.

test_cases.name: testPublicPostMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the public POST method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testPublicGetMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the public GET method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testPublicPutMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the public PUT method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testPublicDeleteMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the public DELETE method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testPublicInvalidMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid HTTP method in the public request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testPublicInvalidUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid URL in the public request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyPostMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the API key POST method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyGetMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the API key GET method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyPutMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the API key PUT method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyDeleteMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the API key DELETE method request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyInvalidMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid HTTP method in the API key request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testApiKeyInvalidUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid URL in the API key request building functionality.

test_cases.name: testWebSocketUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the WebSocket request building functionality.
